title: The Big picture: conservation treatment of a large painting
creator_credit: Ian Hart, Canberra. College of Advanced Education. Media Centre and Department of Home Affairs
brief_description: Conservators, Allan Byrne and Tom Dixon, discuss the restoration of the huge oil paint by Tom Roberts entitled “The Opening of the First Parliament of the Australian Commonwealth by His Majesty King George V (when Duke of York). 9th May 1901”. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels and tertiary/teacher level.
